nodes.text: One suit of Fenelar armor was present in the gallery of the crime lord, Gallo Memm on the planet Vaynai during the time of the Galactic Empire. This particular suit of armor was equipped with motion and sound sensors, a comlink, concealed combat knives, and an infrared imaging system. The suit of Fenelar armor was also engraved and designed to intimidate those who saw it.
Fenelar armor was referred to as Felenar armor in Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords. Jason Fry has confirmed this as a spelling mistake.
